name: James Jones
description:
This is a game about trying to retrieve crystal from an ancient civilization. But the crystal has cracked and you must retrieve shards of it instead! Crystal shards are only on some levels such as 2 and 4. In order to progress further you must go through portals but on levels with crystal shards you must collect the crystal shards first.

Notes;

I left the water gun in but it doesn't damage enemies.

Also this style is inspired by benbonk watch his pico 8 video!

 Further notes:

Disclaimer:

    This may be a bit long.

This is my first game that I would call a game, I do have one more project up but I'm not that proud of it and there was also a lot more planned for it that I never got around to doing. This game is made in Godot (as stated by the the gdwild game jam I put in the tagline), my first full project in it. I know that it may not be the best game but I'm happy with it and I've learnt a lot during this jam.

    One more note, I plan to add sound effects and music but I don't want to miss the deadline. They probably will come though. Also please give constructive criticism  so I may learn what I did wrong and right with this game.

Thank you.
